Student email

This is optional text. UQ student email accounts are currently hosted on the Microsoft Office365 platform. ITS has created the guides below to assist with setting up and managing your student email. If you require additional assistance, please consult the official Microsoft help guides (help.outlook.com) or contact AskUs.

  • Installing Office 365 (Staff & Students)
  • Office 365 for students - FAQ
  • Setting up your student email It's really easy to setup your student email.
  • Managing your student email
